DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , randomize , double-blind , parallel group , placebo-controlled , proof concept study investigate efficacy safety RG7314 adult participant ASD . In Stage I study , participant randomize 2:1 receive daily oral dos 1.5 milligram ( mg ) RG7314 placebo 12 week . After independent safety review , study may proceed Stage II . In Stage II study , additional participant randomize 2:1 receive daily oral dos 4 mg RG7314 placebo 12 week . After independent safety review , Stage III start wherein additional participant randomize 2:1 receive daily oral dos 10 mg RG7314 placebo 12 week . During Stage III , safety review independent safety review twice safety signal observe , additional participant randomize 1:1:1 either receive 1.5 milligram per day ( mg/day ) 10 mg/day RG7314 orally placebo 12 week Stage IV .
